User.Login: SELECT User.UserId,USER.RoleId,MEMBER.MemberId, MEMBER.DesignationId, USER.UserName,USER.Password,ROLE.Name AS Role,DESIGNATION.Name AS Designation,DESIGNATION.Hierarchy_Value,DESIGNATION.Membership_Fee, MEMBER.Status AS Member_Status,MEMBER.Joined_Date,MEMBER.Membership_Renew_Status,MEMBER.Last_Renewed_Date FROM `user` User LEFT JOIN `role` ROLE ON ROLE.RoleId = USER.RoleId LEFT JOIN `member` MEMBER ON MEMBER.UserId = USER.UserId LEFT JOIN `designation` DESIGNATION ON DESIGNATION.DesignationId = MEMBER.DesignationId WHERE UserName = ? AND Password = ?

Select.Count: SELECT count(*) AS Total_Count FROM `user` WHERE UserId !=?
Select.All: SELECT USER.`UserId`, USER.`RoleId`,ROLE.Name AS Role, ROLE.Remarks AS Role_Remarks, USER.`UserName`, USER.`Password` FROM `user` USER LEFT JOIN ROLE ON ROLE.RoleId = USER.RoleId WHERE USER.`UserId` !=? ORDER BY USER.`UserName`
Select.ById: SELECT USER.`UserId`, USER.`RoleId`,ROLE.Name AS Role, ROLE.Remarks AS Role_Remarks, USER.`UserName`, USER.`Password` FROM `user` USER LEFT JOIN ROLE ON ROLE.RoleId = USER.RoleId WHERE USER.`UserId`=? ORDER BY USER.`UserName`
Select.Paginate: SELECT USER.`UserId`, USER.`RoleId`,ROLE.Name AS Role, ROLE.Remarks AS Role_Remarks, USER.`UserName`, USER.`Password` FROM `user` USER  LEFT JOIN ROLE ON ROLE.RoleId = USER.RoleId WHERE USER.`UserId` !=? ORDER BY USER.`UserName` LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

Count.CountALL: SELECT  count(*) AS Total_Count FROM `rolepermission` RP LEFT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId LEFT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId
Count.CountByRoleId: SELECT  count(*) AS Total_Count FROM `rolepermission` RP LEFT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId LEFT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.RoleId = ?
Count.CountByPermissionId: SELECT  count(*) AS Total_Count FROM `rolepermission` RP LEFT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId LEFT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.PermissionId = ?

Paginate.ByRoleId: SELECT RP.RolePermissionId, RP.RoleId, RP.PermissionId,R.Name AS Role, R.Remarks As Role_Remarks, P.Name AS Permission , P.Remarks AS Permission_Remarks, RP.Status As RolePermission_Status FROM `rolepermission` RP LEFT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId LEFT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.RoleId = ? ORDER BY R.Name LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
Paginate.ByPermissionId: SELECT RP.RolePermissionId, RP.RoleId, RP.PermissionId,R.Name AS Role, R.Remarks As Role_Remarks, P.Name AS Permission , P.Remarks AS Permission_Remarks, RP.Status As RolePermission_Status FROM `rolepermission` RP LEFT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId LEFT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.PermissionId = ? ORDER BY R.Name LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
Paginate.All: SELECT RP.RolePermissionId, RP.RoleId, RP.PermissionId,R.Name AS Role, R.Remarks As Role_Remarks, P.Name AS Permission , P.Remarks AS Permission_Remarks, RP.Status As RolePermission_Status FROM `rolepermission` RP LEFT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId LEFT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId ORDER BY R.Name LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

All.ByRoleId: SELECT RP.RolePermissionId, RP.RoleId, RP.PermissionId,R.Name AS Role, R.Remarks As Role_Remarks, P.Name AS Permission , P.Remarks AS Permission_Remarks, RP.Status As RolePermission_Status FROM `rolepermission` RP LEFT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId LEFT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.RoleId = ? ORDER BY R.Name
All.ByPermissionId: SELECT RP.RolePermissionId, RP.RoleId, RP.PermissionId,R.Name AS Role, R.Remarks As Role_Remarks, P.Name AS Permission , P.Remarks AS Permission_Remarks, RP.Status As RolePermission_Status FROM `rolepermission` RP LEFT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId LEFT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.PermissionId = ? ORDER BY R.Name
All.ByRolePermissionId: SELECT RP.RolePermissionId, RP.RoleId, RP.PermissionId,R.Name AS Role, R.Remarks As Role_Remarks, P.Name AS Permission , P.Remarks AS Permission_Remarks, RP.Status As RolePermission_Status FROM `rolepermission` RP LEFT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId LEFT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.RolePermissionId = ? ORDER BY R.Name

Select.ById: SELECT `PermissionId`,`Name`,`Remarks` FROM `permission` WHERE `PermissionId`=? ORDER BY Name
Select.Paginate: SELECT `PermissionId`, `Name`, `Remarks` FROM `permission` ORDER BY Name LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

Select.ById: SELECT `RoleId`,`Name`,`Remarks` FROM `role` WHERE `RoleId`=? ORDER BY Name
Select.Paginate: SELECT `RoleId`, `Name`, `Remarks` FROM `role` ORDER BY Name LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

Select.ById: SELECT `PenaltyCriteriaId`, `Number_of_Exceeded_Days`, `Amount` FROM `penaltycriteria` WHERE `PenaltyCriteriaId`=? ORDER BY Number_of_Exceeded_Days
Select.Paginate: SELECT `PenaltyCriteriaId`, `Number_of_Exceeded_Days`, `Amount` FROM `penaltycriteria` ORDER BY Number_of_Exceeded_Days LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

Select.ById: SELECT `DesignationId`, `Name`, `Membership_Fee`, `Hierarchy_Value`, `Remarks` FROM `designation` WHERE `DesignationId`=? ORDER BY Name
Select.Paginate: SELECT `DesignationId`, `Name`, `Membership_Fee`, `Hierarchy_Value`, `Remarks`  FROM `designation` ORDER BY Name LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

Select.Count: SELECT count(*) AS Total_Count FROM `member` WHERE UserId !=?
Select.CountWithoutUser: SELECT count(*) AS Total_Count FROM `member` WHERE UserId IS NULL
Select.All: SELECT MEMBER.`MemberId`, MEMBER.`UserId`, MEMBER.`DesignationId`, MEMBER.`Name`, MEMBER.`DOB`, MEMBER.`Address`, MEMBER.`Profession`, MEMBER.`Gender`, MEMBER.`Contact`, MEMBER.`Status`, MEMBER.`Joined_Date`, MEMBER.`Membership_Renew_Status`, MEMBER.`Last_Renewed_Date` , DESIGNATION.`Name` AS Designation, DESIGNATION.`Hierarchy_Value`, DESIGNATION.`Membership_Fee` as Membership_Charge, USER.`UserName`, USER.`RoleId`, ROLE.`Name` AS Role FROM `member` MEMBER LEFT JOIN `designation` DESIGNATION ON DESIGNATION.`DesignationId` = MEMBER.`DesignationId` LEFT JOIN `user` USER on USER.`UserId` = MEMBER.`UserId` LEFT JOIN `role` ROLE on USER.`RoleId` = ROLE.`RoleId` WHERE MEMBER.`UserId` != ? ORDER BY MEMBER.`Name`
Select.ById: SELECT MEMBER.`MemberId`, MEMBER.`UserId`, MEMBER.`DesignationId`, MEMBER.`Name`, MEMBER.`DOB`, MEMBER.`Address`, MEMBER.`Profession`, MEMBER.`Gender`, MEMBER.`Contact`, MEMBER.`Status`, MEMBER.`Joined_Date`, MEMBER.`Membership_Renew_Status`, MEMBER.`Last_Renewed_Date` , DESIGNATION.`Name` AS Designation, DESIGNATION.`Hierarchy_Value`, DESIGNATION.`Membership_Fee` as Membership_Charge, USER.`UserName`, USER.`RoleId`, ROLE.`Name` AS Role FROM `member` MEMBER LEFT JOIN `designation` DESIGNATION ON DESIGNATION.`DesignationId` = MEMBER.`DesignationId` LEFT JOIN `user` USER on USER.`UserId` = MEMBER.`UserId` LEFT JOIN `role` ROLE on USER.`RoleId` = ROLE.`RoleId` WHERE MEMBER.`MemberId` =? ORDER BY MEMBER.`Name`
Select.ByUserId: SELECT MEMBER.`MemberId`, MEMBER.`UserId`, MEMBER.`DesignationId`, MEMBER.`Name`, MEMBER.`DOB`, MEMBER.`Address`, MEMBER.`Profession`, MEMBER.`Gender`, MEMBER.`Contact`, MEMBER.`Status`, MEMBER.`Joined_Date`, MEMBER.`Membership_Renew_Status`, MEMBER.`Last_Renewed_Date` , DESIGNATION.`Name` AS Designation, DESIGNATION.`Hierarchy_Value`, DESIGNATION.`Membership_Fee` as Membership_Charge, USER.`UserName`, USER.`RoleId`, ROLE.`Name` AS Role FROM `member` MEMBER LEFT JOIN `designation` DESIGNATION ON DESIGNATION.`DesignationId` = MEMBER.`DesignationId` LEFT JOIN `user` USER on USER.`UserId` = MEMBER.`UserId` LEFT JOIN `role` ROLE on USER.`RoleId` = ROLE.`RoleId` WHERE MEMBER.`UserId` =? ORDER BY MEMBER.`Name`
Select.ByDesignationId: SELECT MEMBER.`MemberId`, MEMBER.`UserId`, MEMBER.`DesignationId`, MEMBER.`Name`, MEMBER.`DOB`, MEMBER.`Address`, MEMBER.`Profession`, MEMBER.`Gender`, MEMBER.`Contact`, MEMBER.`Status`, MEMBER.`Joined_Date`, MEMBER.`Membership_Renew_Status`, MEMBER.`Last_Renewed_Date` , DESIGNATION.`Name` AS Designation, DESIGNATION.`Hierarchy_Value`, DESIGNATION.`Membership_Fee` as Membership_Charge, USER.`UserName`, USER.`RoleId`, ROLE.`Name` AS Role FROM `member` MEMBER LEFT JOIN `designation` DESIGNATION ON DESIGNATION.`DesignationId` = MEMBER.`DesignationId` LEFT JOIN `user` USER on USER.`UserId` = MEMBER.`UserId` LEFT JOIN `role` ROLE on USER.`RoleId` = ROLE.`RoleId` WHERE MEMBER.`DesignationId` =? ORDER BY MEMBER.`Name`
Select.Paginate: SELECT MEMBER.`MemberId`, MEMBER.`UserId`, MEMBER.`DesignationId`, MEMBER.`Name`, MEMBER.`DOB`, MEMBER.`Address`, MEMBER.`Profession`, MEMBER.`Gender`, MEMBER.`Contact`, MEMBER.`Status`, MEMBER.`Joined_Date`, MEMBER.`Membership_Renew_Status`, MEMBER.`Last_Renewed_Date` , DESIGNATION.`Name` AS Designation, DESIGNATION.`Hierarchy_Value`, DESIGNATION.`Membership_Fee` as Membership_Charge, USER.`UserName`, USER.`RoleId`, ROLE.`Name` AS Role FROM `member` MEMBER LEFT JOIN `designation` DESIGNATION ON DESIGNATION.`DesignationId` = MEMBER.`DesignationId` LEFT JOIN `user` USER on USER.`UserId` = MEMBER.`UserId` LEFT JOIN `role` ROLE on USER.`RoleId` = ROLE.`RoleId` WHERE MEMBER.`UserId` !=? ORDER BY MEMBER.`Name` LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
Select.PaginateWithoutUser: SELECT MEMBER.`MemberId`, MEMBER.`UserId`, MEMBER.`DesignationId`, MEMBER.`Name`, MEMBER.`DOB`, MEMBER.`Address`, MEMBER.`Profession`, MEMBER.`Gender`, MEMBER.`Contact`, MEMBER.`Status`, MEMBER.`Joined_Date`, MEMBER.`Membership_Renew_Status`, MEMBER.`Last_Renewed_Date` , DESIGNATION.`Name` AS Designation, DESIGNATION.`Hierarchy_Value`, DESIGNATION.`Membership_Fee` as Membership_Charge, USER.`UserName`, USER.`RoleId`, ROLE.`Name` AS Role FROM `member` MEMBER LEFT JOIN `designation` DESIGNATION ON DESIGNATION.`DesignationId` = MEMBER.`DesignationId` LEFT JOIN `user` USER on USER.`UserId` = MEMBER.`UserId` LEFT JOIN `role` ROLE on USER.`RoleId` = ROLE.`RoleId` WHERE MEMBER.`UserId` IS NULL ORDER BY MEMBER.`Name` LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0

Select.ById: SELECT `BranchId`, `ParentId`, `Name`, `Address`, `Contact`, `Status` FROM `branch` WHERE `BranchId`=? ORDER BY Name
Select.Paginate: SELECT `BranchId`, `ParentId`, `Name`, `Address`, `Contact`, `Status` FROM `branch` ORDER BY Name LIMIT ? OFFSET ?

Select.All: SELECT ALLIGATIONS.`AlligationsAndRewardsID`, ALLIGATIONS.`MemberId`, ALLIGATIONS.`Type`, ALLIGATIONS.`Title`, ALLIGATIONS.`Description`,MEMBER.`Name`  FROM `alligationsandrewards` ALLIGATIONS LEFT JOIN `member` MEMBER ON MEMBER.`MemberId` = ALLIGATIONS.`MemberId` ORDER BY Title
Select.ById: SELECT ALLIGATIONS.`AlligationsAndRewardsID`, ALLIGATIONS.`MemberId`, ALLIGATIONS.`Type`, ALLIGATIONS.`Title`, ALLIGATIONS.`Description`,MEMBER.`Name`  FROM `alligationsandrewards` ALLIGATIONS LEFT JOIN `member` MEMBER ON MEMBER.`MemberId` = ALLIGATIONS.`MemberId` WHERE `AlligationsAndRewardsID`=? ORDER BY Title
Select.Paginate: SELECT ALLIGATIONS.`AlligationsAndRewardsID`, ALLIGATIONS.`MemberId`, ALLIGATIONS.`Type`, ALLIGATIONS.`Title`, ALLIGATIONS.`Description`,MEMBER.`Name`  FROM `alligationsandrewards` ALLIGATIONS LEFT JOIN `member` MEMBER ON MEMBER.`MemberId` = ALLIGATIONS.`MemberId` ORDER BY Title LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
